page.title: 20LICHFIELD HEALTH CLUB
page.content: {Lichfield Health and Fitness Club} has been open since 1982,since then it has had two and a half thousand members.For full membership you have to be eighteen,just for Keep Fit lessons on Saturday mornings you have to be four or over.The facilities include a gymnasium,jacuzzi,sauna,sunbeds, hairdressing salon,creche, bar, restaurant,and beauty salon.It is open from ten in the morning to eleven at night. There are many different classes such as 'Take it easy','Keep fit for kids', 'Dance'and many others. They are planning to build a new staircase,and extend the gymnasium. There has been an increase in the interest in Keep Fit in recent years.
